metadata.Title: CVE-2012-3534 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
GNU Gatekeeper before 3.1 does not limit the number of connections to the status port, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (connection and thread consumption) via a large number of connections.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3534` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gnugk - 2:3.0.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gnugk package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:3.0.2-2').
